name: Evil Dead: Regeneration
description:
Evil Dead: Regeneration is an action game developed by Cranky Pants Games. It came out on 13-09-2005. THQ published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Evil Dead: Regeneration on PC, Xbox and PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Raphael Hernandez. It was scored by Keith Arem and Michael Cohen.
